quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"-ville"（常见村庄后缀）的字面联想，将"vaudeville"误解为"村庄"或"乡村相关事物"
quiz_item.sentence: At the turn of the 20th century, families often went to local theaters to watch **vaudeville**—a mix of comedy skits, song-and-dance numbers, and magic tricks.

option.definition: 19世纪末20世纪初流行的杂耍表演（含喜剧、歌舞等）
